mapper.sql: menu_id, parent_id, `name`, url, perms, `type`, icon, order_num
mapper.select: select a.* from sys_menu a left join sys_code_menu b on a.menu_id = b.menu_id left join sys_code c on b.sys_id = c.id where c.application_name = #{applicationName}

select a.* from sys_menu a left join sys_code_menu b on a.menu_id = b.menu_id left join sys_code c on b.sys_id = c.id left join sys_role_menu d on a.menu_id = d.menu_id left join sys_user_role e on d.role_id = e.role_id where c.application_name = #{applicationName} and e.user_id = #{userId} and PARENT_ID = #{parentId}
select c.* from sys_code a left join sys_code_menu b on a.id = b.sys_id left join sys_menu c on b.menu_id = c.menu_id where a.application_name = #{applicationName} and c.type = 0
